sn22.65:1.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu …pe… ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn22.65:1.3: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena …pe… pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn22.65:2.1: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsī”ti?
sn22.65:2.9: Imassa khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmī”ti.
sn22.65:3.2: Sādhu kho tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāsi.
sn22.65:3.3: Rūpaṁ kho, bhikkhu, abhinandamāno baddho mārassa;
sn22.65:3.10: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti …pe…
sn22.65:3.11: aññataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahataṁ ahosīti.
